by_wp_id_short.map: function (doc) {  if (doc.we_source == 'wenotes_wp') {    emit(doc.wp_user_id, [doc.wp_site_ids, doc.tags, doc.display_name, doc.user_nicename, doc.feed_url, doc.we_timestamp]);  }}

by_wp_id_and_url.map: function (doc) {  if (doc.we_source == 'wenotes_wp') {    emit([doc.wp_user_id, doc.feed_url], [doc.wp_site_ids, doc.tags, doc.display_name, doc.user_nicename, doc.we_timestamp]);  }}
